description: Nutrition-packed and delicious lentil spinach curry, served alongside the best rice ever AKA coconut rice.
keywords: lentil spinach curry, spinach lentil curry
name: Lentil Spinach Curry with Coconut Rice
recipeIngredient: 2 and 1/4 cups uncooked white jasmine rice
1 inch ginger (peeled and grated or minced)
1/2 tsp salt plus more to taste
1 and 1/2 tbsp coconut sugar (or brown sugar)
8 ounces fresh baby spinach (about 8 cups, loosely packed)
1/2 cup plain, unsweetened non-dairy milk (see notes)

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the rice well. Add it to your rice cooker along with the rest of the rice ingredients, and enough water to reach level 3 in the rice cooker. Cook until done. If not using a rice cooker, or using a rice cooker without level markings, cook the rice with your usual method and amount of liquid, substituting the coconut milk for 1 and 1/4 cups of the water. Most rice packages will also include instructions. Do NOT make this with only the rice and coconut milk - you need to add water.
